programs.program:
as principal admin password "admin" do
set x = "x"
create principal ab ""
create principal bc ""
create principal ca ""
set delegation x admin read -> ab
set delegation x ab read -> bc
 set delegation x bc read -> ca
set delegation x ca read -> ab
return[]
***

as principal ab password "" do
return x
***

as principal admin password "admin" do
 delete delegation x admin read -> ab
 return []
***

as principal ab password "" do
return x
***
